description: This restaurant’s warm, elegant and rustic atmosphere with wooden furniture and exposed beams provides the setting for its seasonally inspired, regional cuisine. The experienced owners are welcoming and attentive, while the menu features specialities such as frogs’ leg and courgette flower risotto.
